item.content:encoded:
Price: $33.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:44:11 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Baleaf 2022 Light Track Suit

Perfect for running, workout, warm up, training and daily wear

Baleaf Women’s Track Suit

Winter Gear for women and kids

Hot Sale- Womens Active wear

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.98 x 9.33 x 1.85 inches; 12.31 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 7, 2019
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07WR385TB

Drawstring closure
Zippered side pockets to conveniently store your valuables
Elastic waistband with internal drawcord for an adjustable fit
Moisture-wicking, non see-through, breathable and lightweight fabric provides complete coverage
Wide open leg at bottom with the perfect length, makes you look slimmer, also can be worn easily over your gym leggings
Perfect for running, taking walks, gym workout, outdoor, hiking, fitness, jogging, sports training, warm-up or worn over your gym leggings

Baleaf Track Pants with Zipper Pockets design for outdoors and casual

Is this track pant light weight or heavy?

It’s lightweight since the material is lightweight and quick dry, it feels very comfortable.

Does this a sweat pants for exercise or running？

Yes, this is a great warm up pants for workout, exercise, running, sports or style, daily causal.
